price: Uko ni ko Allah acubya imigambi y’abahakanyi.
arabic: ذَٰلِكُمۡ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ مُوهِنُ كَيۡدِ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: dhālikum wa-anna al-laha mūhinu kaydi al-kāfirīna
